content.text: Goldenface is a fictional character and the primary antagonist in the movie Threat Level Midnight, made by Michael Scott. He is portrayed by Jim Halpert.

Goldenface used to work in a gold factory. His boss cared about money. The boss didn't give the employees lunch breaks so they had to eat the gold. Goldenface decided to blow up the Allstar games so the trophies would explode all over the place and everyone could be gold just like him. 3 of his attempts were thwarted by Michael Scarn. When Scarn ran a 20K with Robin Williams, Goldenface blew up the WNBA Allstar game which resulted in the death of Scarn's wife.
